name: Tom Waddell Urban Health Clinic
description: The Tom Waddell Urban Health Center serves adults experiencing homelessness, residents of supportive housing, and other members of San Francisco's Tenderloin neighborhood. Services include health care and harm reduction.
fullDescription: The Tom Waddell Urban Health Center serves adults experiencing homelessness, residents of supportive housing, and other members of San Francisco's Tenderloin neighborhood. Services include health care and harm reduction.
whatTheyOffer: The Tom Waddell Urban Health Center serves adults experiencing homelessness, residents of supportive housing, and other members of San Francisco's Tenderloin neighborhood. Services include health care and harm reduction.
address: 230 Golden Gate Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94102
